ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Whats the arguement?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i don t know, like i said i never mem it.  and the way we play, raids and such, we do so often i don t remember the last time i had enough mana to use it.
ygData.messageBody:
> i believe someone said the 40 minute recast was
> standing, not
> sitting. perhaps
> i misread something.

i don't know, like i said i never mem it. and the way we play, raids and
such, we do so often i don't remember the last time i had enough mana to use
it.

> my first point was that 0.20 damage per second is worst case,
> and secondly, if you thought
> DDD was useless (which it may be in most situations, although
> for those folks who
> always complain they have nothing to do in enchanter groups,
> this seems like something
> that might be worthwhile) that you must also think HT is useless.

i think Adam is right, there is always something better to do than DDD.
lemme think a sec, yes always. and if there is always something better to
do than DDD, then it is useless.

Shada
